items.sentence: Why do you think that I'd be interested in doing that?
I didn't think that you'd be interested in doing that.
Did you really think that I wouldn't help you do that?
We didn't think that about that until it was too late.
I think that I can explain that so you can understand.
It seems that Tom actually thinks that he can do that.
I think that it's highly unlikely Tom will go bowling.
Little by little, I'm beginning to like that painting.
I'm terribly busy because the report deadline is near.
With some foreboding, we entered the petrified forest.
They all stopped and turned to see what was happening.
You should've learned how to swim when you were young.
You should've done it earlier. It can't be helped now.
The cap that my mom bought for me is too small for me.
Is Tom the only one here who doesn't have a chauffeur?
No matter how rough things get, we'll survive somehow.
I'm just learning how to do this, like everybody else.
I'm not sure about the others, but I plan to be there.
Tom is going to bake a cake for Mary's birthday party.
What's so special about the first sunrise of the year?
I don't want you to tell anybody what I just told you.
It's been very tough to get anything done around here.
It made little sense to do that, so we decided not to.
Tom didn't want to tell you, but I told him he should.
I can't speak French, but I hope I'll be able to soon.
I can't think of any reason that we shouldn't do that.
The rugged terrain made the troops' advance difficult.
The older Tom gets, the more he looks like his father.
Tom said he'd rather stay at a hotel near the airport.
If I could go anywhere in the world, I'd go to Boston.
Are you better at speaking French or speaking English?
Do you think you'll be able to visit Boston next year?
How much money did you spend while you were in Boston?
I wonder why Tom didn't do what he was supposed to do.
Tom has gotten fatter since the last time you saw him.
Your singing would put a professional singer to shame.
My wife is throwing a baby shower for her best friend.
Tom didn't read the report that Mary told him to read.
They're planning to tear this building down next year.
It's difficult to catch a rabbit with your bare hands.
I didn't spend as much time doing that as I should've.
This bottle of wine tastes a lot better than that one.
I was pretty sure that Tom would be there, and he was.
How do you think that your friends would describe you?
I want to write a book about the spiders of my region.
I just had a quick look. It wasn't interesting at all.
I took some creative liberties. I hope you don't mind.
I had to take down my tent because of the strong wind.
I had to hold my dog back when a cat crossed our lawn.
I want to apologize for my behavior yesterday evening.
